text: @realDonaldTrump @narendramodi I am very sad about the deaths of the covid19-pandemic in the USA. It is more than terrible and cruelful! It must give an investigatian in Wuhan/China! But also it must give a good cooperation of the nations in the world to develope the best medicine against coronavirus! Do it!
